verbose_text: One patient in group A had the lowest granulocyte count of 1.2 x 10 9 / L and platelet count of 3 x 10 9 / L; another patient in the group B had a granulocyte count of 2.2 x 10 9 / L and platelet count of 6 x 10 9 / L. Drugs were used to stimulate the proliferation of white blood cells for these two patients, and the granulocyte count and hemoglobin level recovered to normal levels at 14-day postoperation.
